name: Launch Codes (mark.nixon)
description:
Objective

Gather USB launch keys around the map to stop the nuke launch! You have FIVE minutes!

  • Choose between different characters.
  • Spend gold that you find around the map on upgrades at stores.
  • Attack or Evade against enemies!
Controls

{Keyboard} - WASD for player movement, Spacebar to throw projectile, Press Q to interact with signs and stores, Press P for pause.
{Mobile/Tablet} - Use on screen buttons or gamepad
{Gamepad} Supports D-Pads, Configure Buttons in options menu

Created for the libGDX Game Jam March 2020 Theme: GLOBAL THERMONUCLEAR WAR
